long_description: Even if it's a challenge for you to keep up with her, the Columbia MegaTrail pants will keep up with your active girl's every move by offering superior comfort and stretch. Omni-Shield(TM) fabric repels water and resists abrasion while remaining soft and flexible. Integrated Omni-Shade(TM) UPF 50+ sun protection guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. A touch of stretch ensures freedom of movement and improved fit. Partial elastic at the waist offers a snug fit. Columbia MegaTrail pants dry quickly so they can be washed and worn again in a matter of hours.
